title: Xenopopper
summaries: The Xenopopper is a Hardmode, post-Golem gun that uses bullets as ammunition, but fires a small initial cloud of four to five simultaneous "bubbles". The bubbles themselves do no damage and will bounce off solid blocks. They then pop after a short delay, firing bullets (one per bubble) that converge at the cursor's location. Each firing consumes only one bullet but produces four to five projectiles each.
The Xenopopper has a 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) chance to be dropped by the Martian Saucer during the Martian Madness event.
